Package com.company

Class RecursiveFunctions

java.lang.Object
com.company.RecursiveFunctions
public class RecursiveFunctions extends Object
Class of various recursive functions. Functions are not exactly related.

  • Method Details

    • findString

      public static int findString(String searchedIn, String searched, int occurrence)
      Searches given string in the given other string. Returns the index of the first letter of the text that is searched when it's found.
      Parameters:
      searchedIn - The text that searched is searched in.
      searched - The text that is searched.
      occurrence - Number of times the given text has to be found to return its index.
      Returns:
      If given text is found, the index of it's first letter in the text that was searched in. -1 otherwise.

    • countInBetween

      public static int countInBetween(int[] arr, int floor, int ceil)
      Counts the number of integers there are in between given two integers in the given ordered integer array.
      Parameters:
      arr - Ordered integer array.
      floor - Lesser one of limiting integers.
      ceil - Greater one of the limiting integers.
      Returns:
      If ceil is greater than floor then number of integers between them excluding themselves in the array is returned. If ceil is lesser than floor then negative of number of integers between them including themselves. If they are equal or not found in the array -1.

    • findSummingSubarrays

      public static List<List<Integer>> findSummingSubarrays(int[] arr, int sum)
      Searches for integer lists whose sum is equal to given sum that are continuously found in given array.
      Parameters:
      arr - Array that subarray of integers whose sum is equal to given sum are searched in continuously.
      sum - What shall continuous valid subarrays shall return upon adding up all of their elements.
      Returns:
      List of integer lists whose sum is equal to given sum that are continuously found in given array.

    • printArrayFillings

      public static void printArrayFillings(int size)
      Prints all possible distinct fillings of a 1D array with given size with spacing every filling block one element between them.
      Parameters:
      size - Size of the array.

    • printMatrixFillings

      public static void printMatrixFillings(int sideLength)
      Prints all possible distinct fillings of a square matrix with side length of given integer with snakes of length same as side length that can bend only vertical or lateral.
      Parameters:
      sideLength - Side length of the square matrix.
